Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.models

Class Deck<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.models.Deck<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Indicates the type of cards in the deck.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Deck<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is composed of three decks that contains the playable, exited (on the game board or in players' hand) and discarded (already used and needed to be reshuffled) cards.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This method is used to remove a card from playable deck and (ex: replacement of card that are on the ground)
      @NotNull java.util.List<T> exitCards​(int n)
      This method is used when more cards are removed from playable card deck adding them to the exited one
      int remainedCards()
      Returns the number of cards still drawable.

      • discardCard

        @NotNull
public T discardCard()
        This method moves a card from the playable deck to the discarded one.
        Returns:
        The discarded card.
        Throws:
        EmptyDeckException - Thrown when there are no more available cards, and the deck is not shuffleable.

      • exitCard

        @NotNull
public T exitCard()
        This method is used to remove a card from playable deck and (ex: replacement of card that are on the ground)
        Returns:
        The exited card
        Throws:
        EmptyDeckException - Thrown when there are no more available cards, and the deck is not shufflable.

      • exitCards

        @NotNull
public @NotNull java.util.List<T> exitCards​(int n)
        This method is used when more cards are removed from playable card deck adding them to the exited one
        Parameters:
        n - Number of cards that you have to remove from the deck.
        Returns:
        List of card removed from the deck.
        Throws:
        EmptyDeckException - Thrown when there are no more available cards, and the deck is not shuffleable.

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard​(@NotNull
                        T exitedCard)
        This method is used when an exited card is used, it will be added to discarded card deck.
        Parameters:
        exitedCard - The card that has been used.
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - Thrown when specified card isn't in the group of the exited.
